autoscaling.autoscalers.isoscaler¶

Define IsoScaler class.

class autoscaling.autoscalers.isoscaler.IsoScaler(*argv, **kwargs)¶

Helper class for automatic scaling of dynamically-constrained optimization problems via the isoscaling (IS) method.

refs¶

dict – Maps a variable’s global name to its ref value.

ref0s¶

dict – Maps a variable’s global name to its ref0 value.

defect_refs¶

dict – Maps a variable’s defect’s global name to its defect_ref value.

initialize(jac, lbs, ubs)¶

Initialize, using the given variable bounds and jacobian information.

Parameters:
  • jac (dict) – Jacobian information from which global variable, constraint names are parsed. Assumed to be compatible with the Dymos problem at hand.
  • lbs (dict) – Maps a global variable (not a constraint) name to its lower bound.
  • ubs (dict) – Maps a global variable (not a constraint) name to its upper bound.
